data.title: Gilan Province Attractions, Things to do in Gilan Province, Iran
data.meta_description: Best Gilan province tourist attractions on PinIRAN: Find photos, details and reviews for 34 things to do in Gilan province, Iran. Discover historic sites, museums, restaurants, shopping areas and top-rated & must-see attractions.
data.text:
Rudsar Beach Beach

Rating: 8.0/10

It is a 30-kilometer coastline that has a beautiful landscape.

Entrance FeeFree Read More

Anzali Lagoon Lagoon

Rating: 9.7/10

Anzali Lagoon is a coastal liman, or lagoon, in the Caspian Sea near Bandar-e Anzali, in the northern Iranian province of Gilan.

Entrance FeeFree Read More

Visadar Waterfall Waterfall

Rating: 9.0/10

This amazing waterfall is located in middle of Talesh forest. Distance from Paresar town is about 15 kilometers.

Entrance FeeFree Read More

Soostan Lagoon Lagoon

Rating: 9.0/10

It is located at southeast of Lahijan. Due to suitable climate, sweet water, vegetation and availability of food, it is home to various species of birds and fish.

Entrance FeeFree Read More

Heyran Telecabin Gondola

Rating: 8.7/10

It is a gondola lift in the Alborz mountain range, within Ardabil & Gilan province. It is located near in the city of 25 km from ardabil city and 35 km from Astara.

Entrance Fee$5 Read More

Rudkhan Castle Castle

Rating: 9.0/10

Rudkhan Castle is a brick and stone medieval castle located 25 km southwest of Fuman, it is a military complex which had been constructed during the Sasanian ...

Entrance FeeFree Read More

Venous Mall Shopping mall

Rating: 9.0/10

Venous Mall is a Shopping Mall located in Hasanroud near Bandar-e Anzali with direct access to Caspian Beach.

Entrance Fee$2 Read More

Sheytan Kooh Mountain

Rating: 8.0/10

It is a hill in the east of Lahijan, a green mountain with a fantastic climate which attracts tourists in all the 4 seasons. In the past it was known as the “Shah-Neshin Kooh”.

Entrance FeeFree Read More

Estil Lagoon Wetland & Lake

Rating: 9.0/10

Estil Lagoon, One of the tourist attractions in Astara city. This Lagoon is 138 acres and has been identified as one of the top five places of tourism in Gilan in 2005.

Entrance FeeFree Read More

Masouleh Village Village

Rating: 9.7/10

Masouleh is a village near Fuman and it's architecture is unique. The buildings have been built into the mountain and are interconnected.

Entrance FeeFree Read More

Ramdasht Beach Beach

Rating: 8.0/10

Ramadasht is a beautiful and coastal area in the city of Rudsar.

Entrance FeeFree Read More

Saqalaksar Lake Lake

Rating: 8.0/10

One of the most beautiful lakes around Rasht city is that many people go there every day. This place is beautiful in all seasons.

Entrance FeeFree Read More

Heyran Village Village

Rating: 9.0/10

Heyran is a village in the Astara area in the Gilan province. The most significant touristic area near this village is the Heyran Col (Gardane-Heyran) which is located in the Astara-Ardebil road.

Entrance FeeFree Read More

Guilan rural heritage museum Museum

Rating: 9.0/10

An amazing collection of cottages, You can have a brief review of Guilan rural architecture and structural concepts and also be a little more familiar with Guilanian culture.

Entrance Fee$4 Read More
